headline: Revvity Wins Permanent Injunction Enforcing Agreements with Cloud Software Group
summary: WALTHAM, Mass., February 20, 2025--Today, Revvity, Inc. (NYSE: RVTY) announced that the Massachusetts Superior Court has ruled in its favor and will issue a permanent injunction to enforce Revvity’s rights under its agreements with Cloud Software Group (CSG) related to the Spotfire® software.
